pages.text: $(li)Hungers are creatures that can be found in the Deserts, Red Sand Dederts, or Swamp.$(br)$(li)They will bury itself in the ground or sand in order not to be detected.$(br)$(li)When they detect the presence of something above them, they will nimbly close their jaws in order to catch their prey.
On death the may drop Bottles o' Enchanting or Void Hearts.

$(li)If this creature makes you any damage, it will randomly remove 1 level of your enchant armor.$(br)$(li)This creature really love to eat everything like you drop on their heads.$(br)$(li)They works as a kind of Trash Can.
$(li)You can join enchanted items with not enchanted items. Just throw them to this creature to combine it and obtain a new enchanted item.

$(li)For example, you can throw a Sword with an Looting 1 enchant applied and other Sword without any kind of Enchant applied.$(br)$(li)Then, this creature will expel from its mouth the new enchanted item.$(br)$(li)This can be used to apply enchants to items using enchanted books and the specific item to enchant.
